org.gridgain.grid.strategies
Class GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.lang.GridMetadataAwareAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.GridCloudEnabledAdapter
          org.gridgain.grid.strategies.GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter
              org.gridgain.grid.strategies.GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, GridCloudEnabled, GridCloudStrategy, GridMetadataAware
public abstract class GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter
extends GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter

Cloud strategy that provides custom actions based on average CPU load on specified subset of nodes. This strategy supports maximum and minimum values for CPU load as well as number of measurements that should all consequently be above or below the threshold for the actions to be triggered (to smooth out the fluctuations near the threshold).

public abstract void onCpuAboveMax(double cpuAvg)

Specified by:
onTime in class GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter

setMaxCpu

public void setMaxCpu(float maxCpu)
Sets CPU usage upper bound. Value must belong to (0, 1) interval. This method can be called before and after activation. The change will take an effect next time method GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter.onTime() is called.

Parameters:
maxCpu - Max CPU usage.

getMaxCpu

public float getMaxCpu()
Gets CPU usage upper bound.

Returns:
Value in (0, 1) interval .

setMinCpu

public void setMinCpu(float minCpu)
Sets CPU usage lower bound. Value must belong to (0, 1) interval . This method can be called before and after activation. The change will take an effect next time method GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter.onTime() is called.

Parameters:
minCpu - Min cpu usage.

getMinCpu

public float getMinCpu()
Gets CPU usage lower bound.

Returns:
Value from (0, 1) interval.

setSampleNumber

public void setSampleNumber(int num)
Sets samples number. Number of samples defines how many measurements (samples) should be consequently outside of the threshold for the actions to be triggered (to smooth out the fluctuations near the threshold).

This method can be called before and after activation. The change will take an effect next time method GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter.onTime() is called.

Parameters:
num - Samples number. Value must be greater than zero.

getSampleNumber

public int getSampleNumber()
Gets sample number. Number of samples defines how many measurements (samples) should be consequently outside of the threshold for the actions to be triggered (to smooth out the fluctuations near the threshold).

Returns:
Sample number.

setPredicates

public void setPredicates(GridPredicate<GridRichNode>... p)
Sets predicates filtering nodes this strategy is working on. If none provided or not set - all nodes in the topology will be used. This method can be called before and after activation. The change will take an effect next time method GridCloudCpuStrategyAdapter.onTime() is called.

Parameters:
p - Optional set of predicates that will define a subset of nodes this strategy is working on.

getPredicates

public GridPredicate<GridRichNode>[] getPredicates()
Gets predicates filtering nodes this strategy is working on.

Returns:
Array of predicates.

isOncePerThreshold

public boolean isOncePerThreshold()
Gets once per threshold flag. This flag indicates whether strategy must be triggered only once when interval has changed. Default value is false meaning that it will trigger every number of measurements as long as CPU average stays outside of the threshold.

Returns:
true if once per interval, false otherwise.

setOncePerThreshold

public void setOncePerThreshold(boolean once)
Sets flag indicating whether strategy must be triggered only once when threshold was crossed. Default value is false meaning that it will trigger every number of measurements as long as CPU average stays outside of the threshold. If set to true the strategy will be triggered only once while threshold was crossed and CPU average doesn't cross it again.

Parameters:
once - Once per interval flag.

toString

public String toString()

toString in class GridCloudTimeStrategyAdapter
